level.heading: COMPENSATION (ยง 1-1106) Members of the Board shall serve without compensation (beyond their salaries asmployees of the District government), except that a Member may be reimbursedor reasonable expenses incurred in the authorized execution of official Boarduties, if approved in advance by the CFO or his/her designee.
SOURCE
level.text: Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7968 (August 13,004) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 4402 (May1, 2007).
